data.name: Deep Space
data.detailed_description:
An alien force is threatening to destroy the stability of the galaxy! It's up to you and your fellow Spacefleet officers to eliminate them and restore peace to the United Alliance of Planets! Or take the role of the unknown creature and eliminate the invading Spacefleet forces!

Gameplay

  • Horror
    Atmospheric and hand-crafted maps give the game a tense feeling
  • Action
    Fight aliens on a ship or on a planet, there's tons of bullets to go around!
  • Strategy
    Tons of weapons, gadgets, and operators make matches intense and skill-orientated!

Features

  • Top-Down multiplayer action, with unique characters and weapons
  • Intense online horror & action
  • Multiplayer teams (Alien & Spacefleet) with many unique team classes
  • All online content can be earned! No Pay-To-Win!
  • Heavy Sci-Fi inspiration from media such as Star Trek, Alien, and Starship Troopers!
  • Fun & challenging currency & leveling system
  • A completely indie experience made by one person
  • (DLC Exclusive) Online Co-Op or Singleplayer campaign

A Strong Community

This game has built up a strong community where members come together to discuss the game, talk with the developer, and queue up for matches! Check out the community hub for a link to the Deep Space discord!

You Get A Voice

Best of all the game is created by a single developer meaning your voice gets heard! Have a problem? Have a suggestion? You get a voice, and many implemented features are community requests!

data.short_description: An alien force is threatening to destroy the stability of the galaxy! Play as an unknown creature or a Spacefleet Officer in this Online Sci-Fi Horror!
data.reviews:
“The game has fun squad play. The many different operators allow for many different scenarios. Overall it's fun with a group of friends”
8/10 – Mark Riley

“I almost shit myself when a giant alien cockroach tried to eat my ass”
9/10 – Anonymous (Wanted their name removed)

“Overall the experience was awesome, had tons of fun with my friends and even my semi-gamer family enjoyed it”
7/10 – Phineas Carberry, Essency Studios

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
